choices: Both say Yes (This starts them both gaining)
Zack says Yes and Cody says No. (This starts Zack gaining)
Cody says Yes and Zack says No. (This starts Cody gaining)
Neither twin agrees. (They begin gaining in other ways)
Carey approaches and the twins ask her if they can take the job,
1.content:
As the twins were walking around Boston they saw that a new business that had opened up. It was a new ice cream parlor that was very well known for creating new and unusual ice cream flavors. Standing in front of the store was a man, looking very anxious, and wearing a chef's hat and apron. He was pacing back and forth as if he was looking for someone.

As they walked by him, they both said in unison "Hello!"

"Hello, children..." the man replied. Zack and Cody were about to walk away when they heard him say "Wait....Children! That's it!" He rushed in front of them.

"Hello children!" he said again, shaking both of the twin's hands. "My name is Tony, and I run and own 'Tony's Fantastic and Creative Ice Cream Emporium, Home of Delicious and Mystical Ice Cream Flavors!....Or just Tony's for short...Anyway, I was wondering if you two boys will be willing to embark on a 'business proposition' for me?"

"Sure!" said Zack, rather quickly.

"Zack! You don't know what he wants!" He snapped at his brother. "What do you want us to do, sir?"

"As you may know," Tony started, "I run a ice cream store. And the main way that we get our business is to come up with new flavors that nobody else has. However, many of my customers are children, but I don't know what flavors children like! So, who I need are a couple of children to be taste testers! What do you think?"

"Hmm....." The twins say.

What happens?
1.title: Chapter 1

choices: The Next Day
11.content:
"You know, that's not a bad idea," said Zack. "Sitting in an ice cream shop, tasting flavours never made before...all the fudge you can handle..."
"Zack!" snapped Cody. "Think about how all of this is gonna cost us! There's no way we can afford twenty ice creams a day!"
"Cost you?" smiled Tony. "It's not gonna cost you a dollar, heck I'll be paying you to do this for me!"
"That's great!" said Zack. "I'm in!"
"Are you really thinking this through?" said Cody. "We can't eat that much ice cream every day!"
"Cody, this is a one in a million opportunity! There must be tonnes of guys out there who would love getting paid to eat ice cream! And now we can!"
"What's the catch?" questioned Cody.
"There is no catch!" said Tony. "I run an ice cream parlour, and some of the flavours are yet to be tested...that's all. It's just ice cream, the worst that could happen is if you get brainfreeze."
"Seriously, Cody, you should join in."
"Isn't ice cream bad for your health?" he said, arrogantly.
"Well, if your really that unsure, I can let you try some of my samples right now!"
They both followed Tony into his shop. It was sparkling and new, and they could here the freezer rumble at the back of the shop. He quickly fetched two sundaes and laid them in front of the twins.
"Just to water your mouths a bit," he grinned. "Just try these, tell me what you think and then you can decide whether to take the job or not."
Zack grabbed a spoon and scooped the ice cream into his mouth.
"It's delicious!" shouted Zack.
"Great!" said Tony. "I'll go get some more!"
Cody took his first spoonful.
"Hey, this really isn't that bad." said Cody.
"Not bad? It's fantastic!" said Zack.
Tony came back with a trolley filled with small bowls. In each of these bowls were five scoops of ice cream.
"This are my new test flavours!" said Tony. "I come up with about a dozen more every day, they're easy to make. All's you have to do is eat fifteen bowls a day and then write your thoughts down. I'll pay you seven bucks an hour, plus a fifty cents pay rise every two weeks you work here."
"That sounds great!" said Zack. "I'm all up for it!"
"Fifteen bowls!" said Cody, gobsmacked. "We can't eat all that each!"
"I can." said Zack.
"But, you've got your health to worry about!"
"I'll let you worry about my health and yours while I eat this ice cream." said Zack.
"But, you could get fat!" said Cody.
"Hey, so could you Mr Healthy! Come on, as long as we walk from our suite to Tony's and back, our figures will be fine!"
"I guess it's ok then...this is ordinary ice cream, right?"
"Well...not quite," said Tony. "I've added extra flavour but their may be a few side effects."
"Oh all right, I give in" said Cody. "Sign me up too!"
Tony put the fifteen bowls of ice cream in front of them. Zack dug in, and soon after, fifteen bowls were gone. He'd eaten more than he could take, but still wanted more.
"You don't look so great," said Cody, who was on his eleventh bowl.
"Neither do you," said Zack "Heck, you look stuffed."
Cody burped loudly and rubbed his thin waist.
"I feel bloated," said Cody. "But I think I can take a little more."
Tony came back through with a camera and began snapping photos.
"What are the photos for?" said Zack.
"Advertisements, blogs...that sort of thing. I need more customers to boost my business, and you look like great mascots. Hey, I'll even stick the pictures on the wall so people can see you enjoying yourselves when they come in."
Tony took out the first two pictures and wrote "Week 1" on a noticeboard. He then pinned the separate pictures of Zack and Cody eating ice cream on and smiled.
"Not bad. Are you guys done?"
"I'm finished." said Zack, pushing away the fifteenth bowl.
"I can't take anymore." moaned Cody, belching over his half finished thirteenth portion.
"That's ok. Just write your thoughts down on the noticeboard over there."
Cody groaned and got off his seat. He and Zack walked over to the noticeboard and put mainly positive comments. They then collected fourteen dollars each,
"So what did you think?" said Zack.
"I think I have indigestion." groaned Cody, clutching his stomach.
"Don't be such a baby, come on lets go buy a hot-dog."
They each bought one, and Cody slowly nibbled his way through his. It warmed up his taste buds a little.
"That's better." he said. "What did Tony do with the ice cream I didn't finish."
"Don't worry, I ate it."
"You did? Man, your stomach must be huge."
They got back into their room and slouched on the couch, exhausted.
"So your coming back tomorrow?"
"I'll try." said Cody. "I'd better take the stairs next time, I don't wanna let that stuff get to my hips."
"Who cares, it's only ice cream" said Zack. "Our summer break is fourteen weeks, we can pack in the job by then and spend the money."
They watched TV for a few hours, before ordering large lunches and dinners from room service. Finally, they got into their pyjamas and went to bed.
11.title: Both say Yes (This starts them both gaining)

choices: Zack eats more at Tony's
Cody, having missed breakfast due to sleeping, eats more
Both twins eat enough to stuff themselves
111.content:
The next morning was a Saturday and Zack rolled over in bed, his eyes gently blinking open. Tony's ice-cream, which he had shovelled into himself the previous day, was settled heavily in the bottom of his belly. But, despite this, he felt ravenous.

With Carey on a tour, she had asked Kurt to splash out on a personal refrigerator for Zack and Cody so they wouldn't starve while she was gone; he had done this, and now a fridge stood on the left side of each bed.

Zack sat up, his potbelly flopping over the waistband of his pants. He'd always been a bigger child and the bigger of the two twins; his size didn't really concern him. He was still quick - not as quick as Cody, but quick nonetheless - at running, and stronger than Cody's weak frame too. Besides, Coach said that the extra pounds Zack carried help his offence in Basketball. This was fine with Zack, as it meant he didn't have to diet, unlike some of the chubbier members of the team, who's weight slowed them down.

His belly rumbled; he put a hand to it and then reached over to the fridge, his belly curving into a slight roll on his sides. He opened the fridge, pulled out the food, and ate until the rumbling in his plump belly stopped... two hours later.

His belly had inflated a little, just enough to contain the food, and the button on his briefs was straining a little. He looked over to the alarm clock; 9:00am. With summer vacation having started the previous day he and Cody could lay in, but in an half-an-hours' time they had to be at Tony's for work.

He got up, his big, jiggly belly wobbling freely over his pants, and made his way to Cody's bed. Cody was snoozing gently in the bed. Zack leaned down and gave Cody a shake.

"Code? We've got work in half-an-hour. You need to get up!"

"What?" grumbled Cody, sitting up and rubbing his eyes. Then, when his vision finally came to him, the first thing he got a view of was Zack's belly.

"We've got work in half-an-hours' time," said Zack, "You need to get dressed."

"Mmm, k," he said and got up.

Zack plodded away, bending down at the pile of clothing on the floor; his love handles wobbled over the edge of his pants.

Cody picked up his own pants and easily put them on; as he reached over for a shirt, he caught sight of Zack.

That's odd, he thought Zack's always been chubby, but he looks chubbier than usual.

Zack huffed and puffed and pulled, the button of his trousers finally meeting over his potbelly. Slipping on a shirt, which clung to his rotund middle, he walked to Cody, said "Let's go," and waited for Cody to put on his shirt.

"Yeah," agreed Cody, "Let's go,"

"I feel particcularly hungry this morning."

"You're always hungry, Zack,"

What happens next?

1111.content:
Zack and Cody quickly grabbed a cab to the mall and headed for Tony's.
Tony was busy helping some customers when the twins arrived.
"Zack! Cody! Please sit down, I've got your bowls right here!"
Tony pointed at a large table, behind his desk, filled with bowls, each containing delicious ice cream.
"You expect us to eat all that? After breakfast?!" Cody asked. He didn't expect so much ice cream.
"Well as taste testers, you have to eat whatever I feed to you. These are all new flavours I came up with."
"Well I am up for it!" Zack said happily as he scratched his belly. Cody sighed and followed his brother to the table.
Zavk sat down, his belly hanging over his jeans. He quickly dug and and finished his second bowl while Cody was still halgway through his first.
"All of this after breakfast? We're overeating Zack."
"Relax Cody, see this as an opportunity to bulk up a little." Zack tried to comfort his brother.
"Well I am more worried about you." Cody said with a soft voice.
"Oh come on!" Zack said as he began to eat his third bowl.
"*sigh* ok forget it." Cody wishpered not wanting to start an argument with his brother in front of customers.

What happens next?
1111.title: Zack eats more at Tony's

choices: At the hotel after Tony's Zack and Cody find Moseby waiting for them
Carey confronts her sons over how much weight they've gained
11111.content:
As he pulled on his basketball uniform three weeks later, Zack couldn't help but notice that it clung more tightly than usual around his belly. Heaving in his belly and forcing the button shut and the zipper up, he turned to Cody, allowing his belly to spill forward; having packed on some weight himself, Cody's uniform wasn't skin tight like Zack's, but now fitted him better than it had.
Alright, Class!" said Coach as they all arrived on the pitch, "This, as you all know, is the try-outs for the team. Some of you, I can see, have been enjoying yourselves this summer," his eyes lingered on Zack's gut; Cody snorted and nudged his brother's stomach with his elbow. As he did so, Coach caught sight of the zipper of Cody's trousers as It slid downwards as his gut moved. "And this will help me to work out who will be on the team next year and who will not. Alright, Class. First, will be three laps of the pitch to warm up, then a practice match."

Zack and Cody got into position at the back of the group and all of them set of running as Coach blew the whistle. Cody set off in a slow jog, while Zack raced ahead, his larger belly bouncing and wobbling. Cody couldn't help but smirk as he watched Zack slow down, puffing heavily as he reached him.

"What's the matter, Zack? Tired?"
"A little," he puffed, "Not sure why. I've put on a little weight, but so have you."
"Ah, well," sighed Cody, "I could use a running partner."
"Pleasure," puffed Zack.

"Alright, Class!" interrupted Coach, "All over here!"
The class walked over - or waddled over in Zack's case - and began the game. Zack, heavier, fatter and more unfit than ever, missed all of his shots and was unable to jump as high as he had before.

Once it had finished, Coach wrote down the results on the board and called the class back over again.
"Right, Wilkins, Edwins, Portcullis, Andrews, Brians, Williams and Johnson have made the team. The rest of you were not good enough this time, I'm afraid. Now, go and get changed."

Zack, feeling horribly ashamed of himself for not getting onto the team, trudged back to the changing rooms; Cody, feeling not to bothered as he'd only come today to see Zack huff and puff, followed.

The rest of the class left, leaving Zack and Cody alone in the changing rooms. Zack and Cody peeled off their uniforms, revealing their plumper frames. Cody's formerly underweight frame was now sporting a larger pot belly that curved forward in a large arc, giving him the appearance of having swallowed a Basketball.

Zack, on the other hand, had already been overweight before he'd gotten the job at Tony's and had swollen into a round, portly frame that meant that he could not see his feet and wore XL clothes, which were beginning to strain around his ever-expanding gut.

He pulled on his jeans, heaved in his belly and fastened them; he breathed out, his belly jiggling forward and straining the jeans to bursting point.

"Come on," said Zack to Cody, "Let's go to Tony's and eat our sorrows away at not making the team."
"You sure you should be eating? You've gained a bit of weight since starting at Tony's."
"I'll lose it for the new semester - we've still got 10 weeks left before we have to be back at school. Besides, you've put on some weight too."
"I'll lose it for the new semester," echoed Cody; his belly growled hungrily, "Come on," he said, wiping his head to wipe off the sweat, "Let's go to Tony's."

13.content:
"I'll do it," Cody said immediately.

"I think I will pass," Zack said with a shake of his head.

"Alright then. Well kid, come with me and we can get started," Tony said to Cody.

"Thank you! I will be right there in a minute," Cody said while Tony walked away.

"So why aren't you doing this?" Cody asked to his brother wondering what the answer may be.

"Well I want to maintain my weight a little. Obviously, I'm the bigger of the two. I want to lose some weight so I can skateboard for now and snowboard soon. Winter is around the corner," Zack said as he patted his small gut, which he knew made him about fifteen pounds heavier than Cody.

"So are you saying I'm going to become fat?" Cody asked offensively.

"No! I mean, you could, but I'm just saying that I don't want the chance of getting any bigger. Just watch your portions. Heck, you're the smarter one anyway," Zack said, which made Cody grin with some cockiness.

"That's right. I am. Don't worry. I'll be fine," Cody said with a grin.

"I'll meet you back at the hotel," Zack said as he began to walk away.

"And I am going to make some serious cash," Cody said with a cocky grin.
13.title: Cody's Sweet Life

135.content:
It's been a week since Cody started working at Tony's as a taste tester, and things have changed over the course of it. You may have noticed, but Cody seemed to like eating ice-cream now and then. He would used to watch his diet and keeping himself heathy for his sake. The problem is it tasted so good, he couldn't stop eating without watching his weight at all.

Since then, his weight had been changed as well. He was in a healthy weight at about 135lbs before he took a job. Now, he looks like he gained about 8lbs in weight, but don't think he notices it, despite his clothes are a bit tight on the waistline. Recently, he finished off a bowl of chocolate ice-cream, where he looked pretty much full for today and deservedly so by letting out a burp and laid back on the chair to calm his stomach down for a bit.

"Wow, you've been eating well, young man!" Tony says just as he came over to check on Cody with loads of bowls being pilled on the table.

"Yeah, and I cannot believe it's been a week since I started work here." Cody replied.

"It is!" Tony remembered well before he continued on saying, "And with that, I got some surprise treats for you, tomorrow if you can manage to come?"

"A surprise eh? That sounds tasty to me! Sure, I'll see you tomorrow, Tony!" Cody accepts and the two waved off as the youngster walked of the ice-cream place, so he could try and get back home for some rest a bit.

143112.content:
It had been a very bad week for Cody, even that his serum he drank had gotten worse as the days had rolled on. He had been getting fatter slowly non-stop, and there was no telling when would it stop and how. He tried on many things, like taking some exercises, and taking diet food as such. But none of it actually worked, and Cody had just gotten bigger ever since.

He was actually gonna try and restore things back to normal by using some chemicals he used before. info.brief_description: The Ultimate Suite Life Weight Gain of Zack and Cody
info.description:
The Ultimate Suite Life Weight Gain of Zack and Cody.

See Zack and Cody gain weight.

The story is set in the Tipton Hotel. The twins are 14 (and cannot become any older or younger). There must be no incent/twincest/gay/lesbian. No instant weight gain (e.g. 1 pound to 1,0000000 in an hour, etc). No magic potions/spells.
